## slot() function

From the provided slot map, it returns the slot value as a string or an empty string if it doesn't find the value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function slot(slots: RequestSlotMap, name: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  slots | [RequestSlotMap](./stentor-models.requestslotmap.md) |  |
|  name | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
